jobTitles.title: Job Titles
jobTitles.description: Search by these job titles. Example: `Software Engineer`. We will run the scraper once for each job title. All filters below will be applied to each job title.

locations.title: Locations Filter
locations.description: Filter by these LinkedIn locations. Example: `San Francisco`

company.title: Company Filter
company.description: Filter by these companies. Provide full URLs or company names to search in LinkedIn

workplaceType.title: Work Location Options
workplaceType.description: Select one or more applicable work location types.

employmentType.title: Work Location Options
employmentType.description: Select one or more applicable work location types.

experienceLevel.title: Experience Level
experienceLevel.description: Select one or more applicable experience levels.

salary.title: Salary Filter
salary.description: Filter by these salary ranges. Example: `100k+`

easyApply.title: LinkedIn Easy Apply
easyApply.description: Filter jobs with LinkedIn easy apply option.

postedLimit.title: Posted Limit
postedLimit.description: Filter jobs posted in the last 24 hours, week or month.

sortBy.title: Sort By
sortBy.description: Sort the results by date or relevance.

maxItems.title: Maximum number of jobs to scrape per each search query input
maxItems.description: Maximum number of jobs to scrape per each search query input.

geoIds.title: Geo IDs Filter
geoIds.description: Filter Jobs by these LinkedIn geo IDs. Example: `103644278`.

page.title: Start Page Number
page.description: Page number to start scraping from. Each page contains 25 jobs.
